description: Triangle of number of permutations of {1, 2, ..., n} having exactly k cycles, each of which is of length >=r for r=4.
comments: Generalizes Stirling numbers of the first kind
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 257.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Permutation cycle.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
